About Us

For over thirty years, the ideal partner for simplifying your administrative practices

Our History

Acentro Services has been active since 1986 in the business administrative practices sector, specializing in managing formalities and compliance with public administration.

Led by Nicola Testa since its foundation, the company has been a pioneer in electronic filing and continues to invest in innovation, constantly training its collaborators and developing cutting-edge services.

Over the years, Acentro Services has evolved from a simple practice agency to a true innovation manager, thanks to pioneering experience in the use and development of digital signatures, PEC, and substitute storage.

1986
Foundation of Acentro Services
1990s
Expansion of services and clientele
2000s
Pioneers in electronic filing
2010s
Development of DIGIPRAM and digital services
Today
Innovation manager for companies and professionals

Our Philosophy

Economy

We offer high-quality services at competitive prices, ensuring the best value for money in the market.

Customer Focus

Each client receives personalized assistance, with a fiduciary approach and deep understanding of their specific needs.

Timeliness

We guarantee quick responses and immediate solutions, respecting deadlines and optimizing practice management times.

Effectiveness

We are committed to successfully resolving every practice, ensuring concrete and measurable results for our clients.

Professionalism

Our team is highly qualified and constantly updated on regulations and procedures, ensuring service excellence.

Our Presence

Acentro Services is present with operational units in Milan, Potenza, and Rome, plus a network of indirect correspondents that ensure capillarity and uniformity of action throughout the national territory.

This structure allows us to effectively serve companies with complex structures distributed across different Italian regions, such as those in medium and large-scale distribution.

Our main office is located in Milan, at Viale C. Espinasse 67, where we coordinate all activities and manage relationships with our national clients.

Our Clients

Medium and Large Distribution

We offer turnkey solutions for authorizations, lease contracts, and licenses, managing administrative practices for points of sale throughout Italy.

Professionals

We support accountants, lawyers, and consultants with personalized services, deadline management, and obligations, in a fiduciary and partnership perspective.

Businesses

We assist businesses of any form and size in managing administrative practices, offering tailored solutions for every need.

Innovation and Technology

Our evolution from a practice agency to an innovation manager has been possible thanks to pioneering experience in the use and development of digital tools such as digital signatures, PEC, and substitute storage.

We make available to our clients the DIGIPRAM management software, specifically designed for administrative practice agencies, which facilitates practice management and offers advanced features like document management.

We continue to invest in innovation, constantly training our collaborators and developing cutting-edge services to meet our clients' evolving needs.

Discover how Acentro Services can simplify your administrative practice management
